com.ltsllc.miranda.node.states

Class NodeStoppingState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ltsllc.miranda.State
      • com.ltsllc.miranda.node.states.NodeStoppingState

  • public class NodeStoppingState
extends State
    A cluster node that is shutting down.

    A Node enters this state when it is the process of shutting down. It assumes that a CloseMessage has already been sent so it waits for a response.

    WHEN IN THIS STATE THE NODE WILL DISCARD ANY MESSAGE OTHER THAN A DISCONNECTED MESSAGE FROM THE NETWORK!
